      SchedulingResult DemandFlexibilityStrategy.adjustPowerConsumption​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> affectedSubmittedJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs, java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs, double consumptionBoundCalcBase, double powerConsumptionBound, int schedulingInterval, int currentTime, ReserveProvisionType provisionType, DC handledDC)
